body_html:
The Java API supports boolean tensors but the TensorFlowInferenceInterface class does not do so yet. See: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/43001532/how-to-feed-boolean-placeholder-by-means-of-tensorflowinferenceinterface-java

Contributions are welcome to make the change suggested in that StackOverflow answer.

FYI @andrewharp

Contributions are welcome to make the change suggested in that StackOverflow answer.
FYI @andrewharp
body:
The Java API supports boolean tensors but the `TensorFlowInferenceInterface` class does not do so yet. See: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/43001532/how-to-feed-boolean-placeholder-by-means-of-tensorflowinferenceinterface-java 

Contributions are welcome to make the change suggested in that StackOverflow answer.

FYI @andrewharp
